entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Missing nullability warnings in delegate conversions #72253
  • False nullability warnings for delegate conversions #72252
  • Cleanup Microsoft.CommonLanguageServerProtocol.Framework #72251
    17.10
  • type hints for collection expressions #72250
  • NRE in QuickInfo #72245
  • VB Value Task #72241
  • EnC: Changing the type of a locked expression should be a rude edit #72240
  • c# struct operator taking "in" (byref) fails to report CS8374 when used with "this" and can expose internals / cause stack corruption #72239

Closed

  • "Find all references" does not find implementation of "partial void" method #72083
  • Too much string allocations in `GetCategoryBasedDotnetAnalyzerDiagnosticSeverityKey` #72161
  • Script<T>.RunAsync not responding to CancellationToken #72179

PullRequests

Created

  • Improve behavior of SyntaxRemoveOptions.AddElasticMarker #72255
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Test PR Turn Snippets On #72254
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • WIP: Allow clients that block on an AsyncLazy to bypass sync-over-async blocking for critical scenarios. #72249
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Update target frameworks #72248
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merge features/vscode_net8 into main #72247
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Avoid performing a defensive copy for enum parameters #72246
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Make shadow copy logic a bit smarter #72244
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged
  • WIP: Reduce SyntaxListBuilder allocations in lexer #72243
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Bump vulnerable transitive dependencies #72242
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Guard the 'CustomSeverityConfigurable' tag with AnalysisLevel 9.0 #72238
    Area-IDE, IDE-CodeStyle, untriaged
  • Convert Clasp into a source package #72237
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Host workspace kind #72236
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Rename BoundNode flag for clarity #72235
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - ParamsCollections
  • Definition items #71959
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Reduce string allocations from `GetCategoryBasedDotnetAnalyzerDiagnosticSeverityKey` #72163
    Area-Analyzers, Community, untriaged
  • Defer create CompilationTracker._buildLock #72223
  • Keep as much parsed state as we can when producing frozen compilations #72184
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Updated

  • Do all parsing work using InProgressState translation actions in the compilation tracker #72215
  • Using Nullable Disabled semantic model to compute semantic classification #71036
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Patterns: Allow non-negative and full integer sets to merge (intersect or union) #71968
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Implement module cancellation and stack probing instrumentations #71896
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Turn Semantic Snippets off by default #71583
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Option type renames #71958
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Reduce symbol array allocations during CSharpSemanticModel.LookupSymbolsInternal #72153
  • Reduce ImmutableDictionary allocations under SolutionCompilationState by using ImmutableSegmentedDictionary #72220
  • Set NetRoslyn value for VMR build #71704
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Support relative paths in interceptors #71879
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Reduce allocations under RemoteAssetProvider.SynchronizeAssetsAsync #72229
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix asserts when emitting calls with optional byref parameters #72203
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Reduce byte[] allocations when opening files #72214
  • Move all the MSBuildWorkspace projects under a single folder #72226
  • Add feature to strike out obsolete symbols #72156
    Area-IDE, untriaged
